riskItems.name: AllowProvilegeEscalation
riskItems.title: Workload allows privilege escalation
riskItems.shortDescription: Privilege escalation allows programs inside the container to run as root
riskItems.description: Privilege escalation allows programs inside the container to run as root, even if the main process is not root

riskItems.name: CapNetRaw
riskItems.title: Workload has container/s with NET_RAW capability
riskItems.shortDescription:
NET_RAW capability enables ARP spoofing from the container
NET_RAW capability enables the container to craft malicious raw packet
riskItems.description:
NET_RAW capability enables ARP spoofing from the container, UDP packets with forged source , IP, etc. Such capability enables the container to perform Man-in-the-Middle (MitM) attacks on the host network
NET_RAW capability enables the container to craft malicious raw packets such as Ping of Death

riskItems.name: WritableFileSystem
riskItems.title: Workload has container/s with writable file system
riskItems.shortDescription: Writable File System allows the persistence of threats
riskItems.description: Writable File System allows threats to persist through restart and upgrades of the container
